com.labyrinthconquest.game.screens

Class MainGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.labyrinthconquest.game.screens.GameScreen
      • com.labyrinthconquest.game.screens.MainGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class MainGame
extends GameScreen
    Represents main game screen in the game, handles drawing main game ui and managing game.
